item.description:
Paddle Flint Pond/Lake Quinsig, Shrewsbury

Sunday Sept 26, meet at 9:00, launch at 9:15am

Due to my schedule, this is probably my last outing for the year, hopefully the weather will hold out!

This is an easy paddle, about 1 1/2 hours, so it will be a good route for beginners, we'll go through the pond into the lake by Sunset Beach, continue through the lake a bit and back into the pond at the other side.

We'll meet at the Flint Pond State Boat Ramp on Rt. 20 in Shrewsbury, which is about 100 yards east of the Shrewsbury/Worcester line. The entrance to the boat ramp is at the traffic light at the intersection of Rt. 20 and Edgemere Blvd.

Reminder - PFDs are required by law to be worn this time of year (and by the group all year anyway!).
item.name: Paddle at Flint Pond/Lake Quinsig, Shrewsbury
